nodes.text: Gorn Sweevas was a male Rodian slave of an Imperial military interrogator during the Cold War. In 3643 BBY Sweevas was with his master on Nar Shaddaa, where he was interrogating Republic spies. One of the spies use the Force to kill all Imperials, including Sweevas' master. Sweevas himself escaped to safety and asked another Imperial to come into the lab and kill the rebelling slaves.
Gorn Sweevas appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic as an NPC on Nar Shaddaa and starts the Heroic mission "Botched Interrogation."
